titleStmt.title: A congratulatory epithalamium, or speech on the arrival of Her Royal Highness, and happy marriage to the most illustrious prince James Duke of York

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p.1 reads: On the arrival of Her Royall Highness, and happy marriage to the most illustrious prince James Duke of York, &c.
Verse - "Whilst now the sun retiring, mews his beams,".
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
